nodes.text: The Hapan Home Fleet was the branch of the Hapan Royal Navy that guarded the planet Hapes.

During the Second Galactic Civil War, Jacen Solo implored Queen Mother Tenel Ka to allow him to use the Home Fleet against the Confederation, which she allowed on the condition that Jacen make peace with his uncle, Luke Skywalker. When Han Solo and Leia Organa Solo persuaded her that Jacen needed to be stopped, however, the Home Fleet was deployed against Jacen at the Battle of Kashyyyk.
